name: Little Traveler's Salad
author: Rachel B.
summary: My mother-in-law served this for the 4th of July. It was a great meal for a warm summer evening when you don't want anything too warm.
ingredients: 12 ounces cooked chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, thinly sliced
¼ cup poppy seed dressing, or to taste
¼ cup French-fried onions, or to taste
directions: Mix romaine lettuce, spinach, and red onion together in a bowl; portion lettuce mixture onto serving plates
Top each serving with macaroni, chicken, roasted red peppers, and bacon
Serve with poppy seed dressing and French-fried onions on the side
